data.title: Welcome To Railway
data.text:
2/4/6 weeks course(s): for Sr. Scale/JAG/SG/SAG officers, click for programme schedule for FY2022-23. FY2023-24 FY2024-25

6 weeks course on SCM: for Sr. Scale/JAG/SG/SAG officers, click for programme schedule for FY2022-23. FY2023-24 FY2024-25

Basic (4-weeks)& Refresher (8-weeks) course: for all officers, click for programme schedule for FY2022-23. FY2023-24 FY2024-25

Notice: for Advance Course(s)-Covid19, click here for details

READ MORE >>

August 2024: 2-days Seminar on “Overview of GFR & Public Procurement through GeM (with latest amendments)” at New Delhi, click for Appeal Letter / Brochure.

June 2024: Overview of GFR & Public Procurement through GeM (with latest amendments) at New Delhi.

Nov 2023: One day Conference on “Arbitration and ADR with special focus on International Arbitration” on 30 November 2023 at New Delhi.

May / July / Oct/ Jan / March (FY 2023-24): Overview of GFR & Public Procurement through GeM (with latest amendments) at New Delhi.

Jan 2023: In-house Training for CSL officers on “Overview of GFR & Public Procurement policy and Procurement through GeM (with latest amendments) held on 23 & 24 Jan 2023 at Kochi (Kerala).

May / July / Sept / March (FY 2022-23): Overview of GFR & Public Procurement through GeM (with latest amendments) at New Delhi.

Since July 2020: Weekly online webinar for Railway Officer’s Short Term Course(s)
